text: An la guiding,[yi nian de] yue shu que shi shi'er ge yue, zhe shi an la zai chuangzao tiandi zhi ri jiu jilu zai jingdian zhong de, qizhong you si ge jin yue [yi li 1 yue,7 yue,11 yue he 12 yue], zhe shi zhengque de suanfa, suoyi, nimen zai jin yue zhong buyao shi ziji shou sunhai. Nimen dang jiti taofa bai ouxiang zhe, youru tamen jiti jingong nimen yiyang. Nimen dang zhidao, an la dique yu jingwei zhe tong zai.
